column1: The Petitioners have filed this application seeking, inter alia, an order in the nature of a
MWFC/1/2020 dated 04.11.2020, marked ‘P7’, issued by the Secretary to the Ministry of
Wildlife & Forest Conservation. An order in the nature of a writ of Certiorari is also sought
to quash the decisions reflected in letters and guidelines, marked ‘P8’ to ‘P9(f)’) & ‘P12’
made in relation to the said Circular, marked ‘P7’. Additionally, the Petitioners are seeking
an order in the nature of a writ of Mandamus directing or compelling the 6th Respondent
to take necessary measures to institute action against all individuals who have destroyed
the forests falling under the provisions of Section 20 of the Forest Ordinance as amended
